name: Stone Pickaxe
description: � The most basic pickaxe available. Every Forger starts their journey with this humble tool. ?

name: Bronze Pickaxe
description: ?? A sturdy upgrade from the stone pickaxe. Bronze offers improved mining power for early-game progression. ?

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: � A reliable iron pickaxe that serves as a solid mid-early game tool for mining harder ores. ?

name: Golden Pickaxe
description: � A gleaming golden pickaxe that offers excellent mining speed. A popular choice for mid-game miners. ?

name: Stonewake's Pickaxe
description: � A legendary pickaxe named after the master miner Stonewake. Features multi-ore mining capability. ?

name: Platinum Pickaxe
description: � A premium platinum pickaxe with excellent mining speed. A solid choice for serious miners. ?

name: Arcane Pickaxe
description: ?? A mystical pickaxe imbued with arcane energy. Capable of mining multiple ores simultaneously. ?

name: Cobalt Pickaxe
description: ?? A sturdy cobalt pickaxe forged from rare blue ore. Excellent for mining in deeper caverns. ?

name: Titanium Pickaxe
description: � A lightweight yet incredibly strong titanium pickaxe. Perfect for extended mining sessions. ?

name: Uranium Pickaxe
description: � A radioactive pickaxe that glows with an eerie green light. Extremely powerful for mining rare ores. ?

name: Mythril Pickaxe
description: � A legendary pickaxe forged from mythical mythril ore. One of the finest mining tools available. ?

name: Lightite Pickaxe
description: � A radiant pickaxe infused with pure light energy. Capable of mining the most resilient ores. ?

name: Magma Pickaxe
description: � A blazing pickaxe forged in volcanic fire. Its molten edge cuts through ore like butter. ?

name: Demonic Pickaxe
description: � The ultimate pickaxe, forged in the depths of hell itself. Unmatched mining power and the ability to mine 3 ores at once. ?
